refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks given system function is Maximum-Phase system or not

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: flag = ismaxphase(b,a) flag = ismaxphase(sos) flag = ismaxphase(...,tol)

listitem.para: Coefficients of numerator polynomial of system function
Coefficients of denumerator polynomial of system function
Second order section matrix of order Kx6
Tolerence in similarities between two numbers in phase response
This function returns logical 1 if system is minimum-phase system (flag = 1)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function determines whether the given system function is minimum-phase system or not . Minimum-phase system means all zeros of transfer function will be inside the unit circle in z-plane,also poles must be within unit circle for stability and causality

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: Checking given system function is minimum phase system or not
refsection.programlisting: b = [1 -0.3 0.02] ; //Numerator polynomial coefficients a = 1 ; //Denumerator polynomial coefficients flag = isminphase(b,a) //This is an example of Minimum-Phase system, hence it will give output as : flag = 1
